ethnic_groups: 36.6% Andorran, 33.0% Spanish, 16.3% Portuguese, 6.3% French, 7.8% others. http://www.estadistica.ad/indexdee.htm Estadísticas de población de Andorra. Ministerio de Justicia e Interior de Andorra
leader_name1: Joan Enric Vives Sicília, François Hollande
footnote1: Before 1999, the French franc and Spanish peseta; the coins and notes of both currencies, however, remained legal tender until 2002. Small amounts of Andorran diners (divided into 100 centim) were minted after 1982.
footnote3: Spanish, French, and Portuguese are also widely spoken and understood. (See Languages of Andorra)
